msbt.message: Hello, ! It's currently : .

I hope you're all taking full advantage of your island time!Just remember, if you push yourself too hard, you'll wind up exhausted.So, please take a break from time to time. It's important to pace yourself!
Right now on , it's : on , , .
Good morning, everyone!
Hello there, everyone!
Good evening, everyone!
Good evening, everyone! I'm here with a late-night broadcast!<10_4 /> I hope I can make it through this
Happy New Year to all of you! I can't wait to see what this year brings.
Hello, everyone! Today is the start of the Lunar New Year! I wish you all good fortune and happiness.
And today we've had the first snow of the year! Winter has finally arrived, !
Can you believe it? Today on we're hosting our very first Fishing Tourney!The tourney will run from 9 AM to 6 PM. Anyone can participate. Just check in at the tent in the plaza!
Can you believe it? Today on we're hosting our very first Fishing Tourney!The tourney will run until 6 PM. Anyone can participate. Just check in at the tent in the plaza!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the spring Fishing Tourney today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The spring Fishing Tourney runs until 6 PM today. Get started in the plaza!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the summer Fishing Tourney today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The summer Fishing Tourney runs until 6 PM today. Get started in the plaza!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the fall Fishing Tourney today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The fall Fishing Tourney runs until 6 PM today. Get started in the plaza!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the winter Fishing Tourney today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The winter Fishing Tourney runs until 6 PM today. Get started in the plaza!
How's this for exciting news? is hosting its very first Bug-Off!The tourney will run from 9 AM to 6 PM. Anyone can participate. Just check in at the tent in the plaza!
How's this for exciting news? is hosting its very first Bug-Off!The tourney will run until 6 PM. Anyone can participate. Just check in at the tent in the plaza!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the first Bug-Off of the season today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The first Bug-Off of the season runs until 6 PM today!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the second Bug-Off of the season today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The second Bug-Off of the season runs until 6 PM today!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the third Bug-Off of the season today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The third Bug-Off of the season runs until 6 PM today!
Starting in the plaza, we'll be holding the final Bug-Off of the season today from 9 AM to 6 PM!
The final Bug-Off of the season runs until 6 PM today!

Can you believe it? Today is the last day of ! This year has meant so much to me Oh my!I better change the subject before this microphone gets all soggy.In celebration of New Year's Eve, we're holding a grand Countdown event in the plaza. We'll be selling and giving away items all day long, so please stop by to participate in the festivities! I can't wait to ring in the new year with everyone on this island!

Good evening! There's a Countdown event for New Year's Eve in the plaza right now!<10_7 arg="210" />The new year is only a few moments away, so head down to the plaza as quickly as you can. See you there!<10_7 arg="210" />
Hello, everyone. I'm sorry to interrupt your day, but I thought you might want to know It's currently : , and time for an island-wide broadcast!
Island superstar is also celebrating a birthday today!
Today is also 's birthday! How wonderful!
Today is also 's birthday! How wonderful!
Today's a special day for some of our island residents! It just so happens it's and
Today's a special day for some of our island residents! It just so happens it's and
's birthday!
's birthday!
many other residents' birthday today! It's amazing that so many of you here share the same birthday!
Happy birthday!!!
Happy birthday!!!
Now for today's announcements
Now for additional announcements
Also!
We have a new friend on our island! Let's give a big welcome to !
, on behalf of your new island family, welcome aboard!
Congrats, ! I'm sure you'll enjoy island life here!
It makes me so happy to have a new friend on the island!
On a slightly different note
Tomorrow, bids a fond a farewell to our dear friend . It's hard to say goodbye, but we wish luck on next big adventure.Be sure to stop by for one last chat before leaves. Maybe bring some tissues.
Today, we have a visitor staying at the campsite!
I hope the entire island joins me in giving our guest a warm welcome!
I hope our guest is able to see what it is that makes such a special place.
Go meet our guest in person and find out more about them!
Oh, one more thing!
I almost forgot
Oh! You should all hear this!

The weather report says we're in for a rare treat tonight: shooting stars! lit by the glow of a sky bursting with shooting stars What a magical sight that will be!If any of you have time tonight, get yourselves outside and look up!

Right now, at this very moment, the sky above is full of shooting stars! It's one of the loveliest sights I've ever beheld, so move  to gaze at the magic overhead. You know, there's a legend that if you make a wish on a shooting star with , it'll definitely come true! I don't know how accurate that legend is, but it's probably worth a try. So make a wish if you wish!
I don't have any big news to share with you all today, but I would like to touch on one seasonal topic.
I was taking a walk on the beach this morning and spotted these rare colored shells called summer shells! As the name suggests, they only wash up during the summertime.
Find a few yourself, and you've got an excellent excuse to craft some fun summer memories!
I sent a recipe for a shell wreath to everyone who has the DIY Recipes app. You should try to make one!
So get out there and pick up a few to craft some fun summer memories before the season comes to an end.

When I was taking my morning walk today, I noticed that some goodies had fallen from the trees. What could be more "fall" than that?Sometimes when you shake trees, they'll surprise you by dropping acorns or even pine cones.So get on out there, folks, and shake things up!

During today's morning walk, I noticed some goodies had fallen from the trees. Sometimes when you shake trees, they'll surprise you by dropping acorns or even pine cones. Actually, that may be one of the last times I come across that familiar sight this year. So get on out there, folks, and shake things up before this lovely season comes to a close!
That reminds me!
I sent out a recipe for a tree's bounty little tree to everyone who has the DIY Recipes app. I look forward to seeing your trees!
I think it would be lovely to see some beautifully crafted fall-themed items pop up around the island.

This morning I couldn't help but notice mushrooms are starting to pop up all over the island. Mmmmushroom pieOf course they're delicious, but don't forget they can also be used in the occasional DIY project.
Speaking of!
Everyone with the DIY Recipes app should have received my recipe for a mushroom wreath. No fall is complete without partaking in that classic combo—foraging and crafting!

By the way, all of the mushrooms that grow on this island are totally safe to eat. That said, it can be very difficult to tell mushrooms apart.When in doubt, be sure to consult a fungal expert before eating any mushrooms you don't recognize.

Snowy days like today always put a chill in my bones that I just can't shake Luckily, nothing warms my heart more than the sight of perfect little snowflakes dancing through the air. Sometimes I'll gently scoop them up with a net to look at their beautiful intricacies way up close.
Oh yes!
Anyone with the DIY Recipes app should have received my recipe for a snowflake wreath. So if you're a snowflake catcher like me, now you can use them to make a beautiful winter decoration!
I wholeheartedly recommend that everyone get out there and try it yourselves.Then you can use the snowflakes to craft something truly wintry!

Oof! Another one of those days that chills you right to the coreWhich means it's also a perfect day to go outside and play in the snow!If you do venture out into the cold, check the ground for snowballs, and give them a little push. Keep rolling them up and, once they get big enough, you can stick two together and make a Snowboy!I hope to see a whole parade of Snowboys on my morning walk tomorrow!

While going through my mental checklist this morning, I was rudely interrupted by an errant maple leaf! After brushing it off my head, I came to the realization that fall must be coming to an end. I do hope you all remember to enjoy this beautiful and vibrant time of year before winter sets in!
Ah!
Those who use the DIY Recipes app will find a new recipe in there for a red-leaf pile. You're welcome!
It is possible to gather maple leaves with a net, you know.You can use them for a DIY project that will help you remember the joys of autumn all year long.
See any cherry-blossom petals fluttering through the air this morning? They looked magical! It's a shame that cherry-blossom season is so short. But maybe that's what makes it so special
Another thing!
I sent all DIY Recipes app users the recipe for an outdoor picnic set.Why not make yourself a nice lunch and enjoy it under the beautiful flowering trees!
I recommend gently scooping up the cherry-blossom petals with a net.Then you can use them to craft something SUPER special!

Earlier today a clump of bamboo caught my eye and reminded me of a piece of horticultural trivia. Did you know you that this time of year is perfect for harvesting fresh bamboo or "young spring bamboo"?
Which also reminds me
You can use young spring bamboo for the bamboo noodle slide recipe I sent out via the DIY Recipes app. It's an exclusive project you can only collect supplies for during this time of year.
Which also reminds meto remind YOU to get crafting and enjoy some of this season's DIY projects.

From the middle of December to early January, the island's cedar trees are decorated with lights! I did my very best to make them as beautiful as they could be but I'm not confident in my results. I accidentally bumped into one of the decorated trees and a few of the ornaments fell right off! I can only imagine what would happen if someone shakes a treeIn the interest of keeping the island tidy, please lend a hand by picking up any fallen ornaments you see.
Oh, right!
I sent out a recipe to all DIY Recipes app users. What for, you may ask?<10_4 /> An ornament wreath!I bet those fallen ornaments you pick up would really come in handy for this type of project
And I'm thinking those fallen ornaments could be pretty useful for some kind of DIY project
Hmmm There really isn't any news to speak of today But<10_4 /> Oh!
The latest copy of my favorite magazine arrived today. I'm looking forward to reading it later!
Listen to this! I was having a hard time with my crossword puzzle, but I finally figured it out!
Here's some personal news! I got to do a video chat with my family back home! Mom and Dad are both great!
I looked up my horoscope for the day and it said I'm going to have good luck!
A sock I've been looking for forever turned up behind my washing machine. It's one of my favorites!
One time, after I ate some cherries, I tied the stems together and made a neat little bracelet!
Have you ever peeled some fruit and managed to keep the whole peel connected? Earlier I did just that!
There really isn't any news to share today, so I suppose I don't have much to say besides my hellos.
Though now that I think about it
Hold on!
Come to think of it
Though I suppose technically the date has changed, and of course

It's almost the end of January, isn't it?<10_4 /> We're already through one month of the new year!February is likely to be chilly as well. Make sure to stay bundled up so you don't catch any coldsOh! Um Be mindful about washing your hands. And cover your mouth if you do cough or sneeze!We need to keep those cold germs in check!Well thenIsabelle signing off!
It's almost the end of January, isn't it?<10_4 /> We're already through one month of the new year!Take a minute to say goodbye to January, everyone. And remember what a great month it's been!
It's almost March! Seems like February really flew by. Maybe because it's the shortest month. Well, fast or slow, I hope all of you broadcast listeners enjoy the end of another wonderful month!
It's almost March! Seems like February really flew by. Maybe because it's the shortest month. Either way, I hope the coming March flies by just as pleasantly!
With March coming to an end, I wonderhow has this month treated everyone? Good, I hope!Well, no matter what kind of March you had, let's make sure that April is filled with joy! Isabelle signing off!

The end of April is already upon us.They say, "Spring has sprung!" But before you know it, spring willspring right out the door! But we won't let that stop us from enjoying May to the fullest, will we? Well then, Isabelle signing off!

It really starts to feel colder at the end of April, doesn't it?I wonder if everyone listening has already switched over to a warmer wardrobe for the season.I'm looking forward to seeing everyone's fall outfits!<10_4 /> Well then, Isabelle signing off!
Today we say goodbye to May.We're going to see some warmer temperatures soon, so make sure you're ready for the change!
Today we say goodbye to May.Chilly weather could be waiting just around the corner. Be sure to take care of yourself. No colds allowed!

Here's an interesting thought the year is half over now!Did it go fast for you? Or slow?My goal for the second half of the year is to support you all and make sure you enjoy each and every day!Well then, Isabelle signing off!

With July ending, we're starting our journey through the height of summer!What is everyone out there doing for fun this summer?If you plan on taking any trips, I hope you remain open to all the fun possibilities out there!And when you're done, I want you to come back home safe and sound to . Well then, Isabelle signing off!

With July ending, we're heading into the thick of winter!Be sure to bundle up when you go out. It's important to stay waOh my! I'll need to be mindful about covering my mouth when I sneeze or cough! Keep those cold germs at bay.Well then, Isabelle signing off!

The end of August is already here!I'm sure we'll still have some warm days ahead, but chillier times aren't too far off!Be ready for lower temperatures overnight Listen to me! I sound like a meteorologist!

We're at the end of August, and here's a nice thoughtOur chilly days are nearly behind us, and we should start seeing some spring weather soon!Now, it's easy to feel a bit under the weather when the seasons change. So take good care of yourselves!

September is on its way out, so our days are going to be on the brisk side soon.Time to switch over to those fall wardrobes, right?I can't wait to see what sort of outfits you put together this year!<10_4 /> Well then, Isabelle signing off!

Today marks the end of September!It's sometimes said spring is full of new encounters as well as partings. Has anything changed in your life? Regardless, I hope that October is a wonderful month for all of you!<10_4 /> Well then, Isabelle signing off!

It's Halloween, which means costumes! I hope I'll see some of you dressed up. I'm sure some of you will be having fun at costume parties, while some of you will opt for a quieter evening. No matter how you spend your Halloween, I hope you enjoy it!

It's Halloween, which means costumes! I hope I'll see some of you dressed up.I'm sure some of you attended one or two costume parties, while some of you opted for a quieter evening. No matter how you spent your Halloween, I hope you're all set for November!

I can hardly believe that November and this entire year are almost over!I'm going to do my best to prepare for our year-end celebration, so you can all enjoy ringing in the new year! Well then, Isabelle signing off!
I don't really have any big news to share today!But it is the start of a new week, and I hope it lives up to each and every one of your expectations!Well then, Isabelle signing off!
No news to share today!<10_4 /> But let's give this week our all, OK? This has been Isabelle. Signing off!
No news todayExcept that I plan to bring you another week of entertaining and informational broadcasts! This has been Isabelle. Signing off!
There's no news that I can think of<10_4 /> It's only Tuesday, so be sure to pace yourselves. Don't overdo it!Well then, Isabelle signing off!

Is there really no news for me to share today?Guess so! But give yourselves a pat on the shoulder, folks. You've made it halfway through the week! Let's finish strong! Well then, Isabelle signing off!
No news to report today!Have yourselves a wonderful Thursdayor as I like to call it, Friday Eve! The weekend's so close, I can almost taste it!Well then, Isabelle signing off!
No breaking news today!<10_4 /> Is it just me or did this week fly by?I know how hard all of you worked, so I hope you enjoy a well-deserved lovely weekend!
No big announcements today.<10_4 /> Instead, allow me to wish you all a fun weekend!
Hmmm There really isn't any news to speak of today

Oh yeah! Did anyone else see that movie that was on TV yesterday? It's that one they play all the time. Even though I've seen it a million times, I never see that final twist coming. I'm still reeling!
Oh! Did anyone else catch that quiz show on TV yesterday?How do they come up with all those questions each week? Let alone all the answers
Hey! Did anyone else watch that variety show on TV yesterday?The stand-up comedian they had on was fantastic! I laughed for an hour straight! It was kind of painful.
Oh! Did anyone else see that talk show yesterday? On TV? You know the one. I like watching for the guests, but the hosts are such chatterboxes!They're always rambling on and onand onand on
Hey! Did anyone else catch yesterday's cooking show?The spiced they featured looked so delicious!I'm thinking about trying out the recipe myself tonight. Wish me luck!

By the way, did anyone tune in for that documentary show that was on TV yesterday? It was all about the history of . And actually, it was quite informative. For one thing, I learned that talking about puts me right to sleep!
Say! Did anyone else catch that concert on TV yesterday?My favorite band was one of the featured acts and their music's still stuck in my head.
Oh dearThere I go again, prattling on about my personal TV habits. Sorry, folks!
Ack! I forgot that yesterday was the cutoff to enter that contest with the great prize
Oh no! I forgot to bring in my laundry this morning!
Uh-oh! I don't think I charged my phone last night What'll I do if there's an emergency?
Phooey! My brother asked me to give him a wake-up call this morning and it totally slipped my mind! I hope he's not still asleep
Err Oh dear. I guess that doesn't really qualify as "news," does it?
That's all for now. I hope you all enjoy the loveliest of lovely days!
That's all for today Have a fun day out there!
And with that, I'll get back to work supporting you and your enjoyment of our island.
